verse.gurmukhi: nIlwrI dy mt ivic pY igdVu rqw[
verse.unicode: ਨੀਲਾਰੀ ਦੇ ਮਟ ਵਿਚਿ ਪੈ ਗਿਦੜੁ ਰਤਾ।

en.bdb: Once a jackal fell into a dyer's vat and got dyed.

transliteration.english: neelaaree dhe maT vich pai gidhaR rataa|
transliteration.hindi: नीलारी दे मट विचि पै गिदड़ु रता।
transliteration.en: neelaaree dhe maT vich pai gidhaR rataa|
transliteration.hi: नीलारी दे मट विचि पै गिदड़ु रता।
transliteration.ipa: nilɑri d̪e məʈ ʋɪt͡ʃ pæ Gɪd̪əɽ rət̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: نیِلاریِ دے مٹ وچ پَے گدڑ رتا۔

verse.gurmukhi: jMgl AMdir jwie kY pwKMfu kmqw[
verse.unicode: ਜੰਗਲ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜਾਇ ਕੈ ਪਾਖੰਡੁ ਕਮਤਾ।

en.bdb: Taking advantage of its changed colour, it went into the jungle and started dissembling (the animals there).

transliteration.english: ja(n)gal a(n)dhar jai kai paakha(n)dd kamataa|
transliteration.hindi: जंगल अंदरि जाइ कै पाखंडु कमता।
transliteration.en: ja(n)gal a(n)dhar jai kai paakha(n)dd kamataa|
transliteration.hi: जंगल अंदरि जाइ कै पाखंडु कमता।
transliteration.ipa: d͡ʒəŋGəl əŋd̪ər d͡ʒɑeɪ kæ pɑkʰəŋɖ kəmət̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: جںگل اںدر جاا کَے پاکھںڈ کمتا۔

verse.gurmukhi: dir syvY imrgwvlI hoie bhY Avqw[
verse.unicode: ਦਰਿ ਸੇਵੈ ਮਿਰਗਾਵਲੀ ਹੋਇ ਬਹੈ ਅਵਤਾ।

en.bdb: Sitting arrogantly in its lair, it would frighten the deer into serving it.

transliteration.english: dhar sevai miragaavalee hoi bahai avataa|
transliteration.hindi: दरि सेवै मिरगावली होइ बहै अवता।
transliteration.en: dhar sevai miragaavalee hoi bahai avataa|
transliteration.hi: दरि सेवै मिरगावली होइ बहै अवता।
transliteration.ipa: d̪ər seʋæ mɪrəGɑʋəli hɔeɪ bəhæ əʋət̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: در سےوَے مرگاولیِ هوا بهَے اوتا۔

verse.gurmukhi: krY hkUmiq AglI kUVY mid mqw[
verse.unicode: ਕਰੈ ਹਕੂਮਤਿ ਅਗਲੀ ਕੂੜੈ ਮਦਿ ਮਤਾ।

en.bdb: Intoxicated by false pride it started ruling (over the animals) with great pomp.

transliteration.english: karai hakoomat agalee kooRai madh mataa|
transliteration.hindi: करै हकूमति अगली कूड़ै मदि मता।
transliteration.en: karai hakoomat agalee kooRai madh mataa|
transliteration.hi: करै हकूमति अगली कूड़ै मदि मता।
transliteration.ipa: kəræ həkumət̪ əGəli kuɽæ məd̪ mət̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: کرَے هکُومت اگلیِ کُوڑَے مد متا۔

verse.gurmukhi: bolix pwj auGwiVAw ijau mUlI pqw[
verse.unicode: ਬੋਲਣਿ ਪਾਜ ਉਘਾੜਿਆ ਜਿਉ ਮੂਲੀ ਪਤਾ।

en.bdb: As eructation indicates the eating of radish leaf, it also got exposed when it (having listened to the howls of other jackals) also started howling.

transliteration.english: bolan paaj ughaaRiaa jiau moolee pataa|
transliteration.hindi: बोलणि पाज उघाड़िआ जिउ मूली पता।
transliteration.en: bolan paaj ughaaRiaa jiau moolee pataa|
transliteration.hi: बोलणि पाज उघाड़िआ जिउ मूली पता।
transliteration.ipa: bɔləɳ pɑd͡ʒ oʊGʰɑɽɪəɑ d͡ʒɪo muli pət̪ɑ.
transliteration.ur: بولݨ پاج اُگھاڑآ جا مُولیِ پتا۔

verse.gurmukhi: iqau drgih mIxw mwrIAY kir kUVu kupqw ]2]
verse.unicode: ਤਿਉ ਦਰਗਹਿ ਮੀਣਾ ਮਾਰੀਐ ਕਰਿ ਕੂੜੁ ਕੁਪਤਾ ॥੨॥

en.bdb: Thus, the dissembler out of his own hypocrisis is beaten hollow in the court of the Lord.

transliteration.english: tiau dharageh meenaa maareeaai kar kooR kupataa ||2||
transliteration.hindi: तिउ दरगहि मीणा मारीऐ करि कूड़ु कुपता ॥२॥
transliteration.en: tiau dharageh meenaa maareeaai kar kooR kupataa ||2||
transliteration.hi: तिउ दरगहि मीणा मारीऐ करि कूड़ु कुपता ॥२॥
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɪo d̪ərəGəh miɳɑ mɑriæ kər kuɽ kʊpət̪ɑ.2.
transliteration.ur: تِا درگه میِݨا ماریِاَے کر کُوڑ کُپتا ۔۔۲۔۔
